name: OperationOutcomeType
title: Operation Outcome Type Code System
description: Extended codes for OperationOutcome.issue.details to provide more specific error categorization

concept.definition: A Reference points to a resource that does not exist in the database
A contained reference (#id) points to a contained resource that does not exist within the resource
A reference within a Bundle points to a fullUrl or urn:uuid that does not exist in the Bundle entries
The resourceType in a Reference does not match the allowed types defined in the element's targetProfile
